header: Order below exh.4 in Cri. MA No. 166/2019 CNR No. MHPU01­000538—2019

background.text: 1. Perused the application and documentary evidence placed on record. Heard the learned Counsel for the applicant. 2. By this application, under Section 438 of Cr.P.C., the applicant /co­accused 4 – Anil Babarao Andhale, seeks ad­interim protection in Crime No. 1344/2018, registered with Hadpsar Police Station, Pune, dated 018.11.2018 under Sections 4/25 of the Arms Act, under Section 37(1) (3)/135 of Maharashtra Police Act and under Section 3 and 7 of Criminal Law Act, since he is apprehending of being arrested.

order.text: ORDER 1) The application stands allowed as under :­  In the event of arrest, the applicant be released on furnishing P.R and S.B of Rs.15,000/­, on following conditions:­ a) He shall not tamper prosecution witnesses. b) He shall not leave India sans the permission of this Court. 2) Issue show cause notice to respondents as to why said order should not be confirmed. Notice r/o: 18.01.2019.

processedText:
Order below exh.4 in Cri. MA No. 166/2019 CNR No. MHPU01­000538—2019 
---header-ends---
1. Perused the application and documentary evidence placed on record. Heard the learned Counsel for the applicant. 2. By this application, under Section 438 of Cr.P.C., the applicant /co­accused 4 – Anil Babarao Andhale, seeks ad­interim protection in Crime No. 1344/2018, registered with Hadpsar Police Station, Pune, dated 018.11.2018 under Sections 4/25 of the Arms Act, under Section 37(1) (3)/135 of Maharashtra Police Act and under Section 3 and 7 of Criminal Law Act, since he is apprehending of being arrested. 
---background-ends---
3. The learned Counsel for the applicant has submitted that the applicant is unnamed accused and 3 to 4 co­accused are released by learned JMFC. The applicant is student having no criminal antecedents. 
---argument-ends---
4. In view of above, apprehension in the mind of applicant seems to be reasonable, warranting ad­interim protection, until hearing of exh.1. Hence, the order : 
---argument-ends---
ORDER 1) The application stands allowed as under :­  In the event of arrest, the applicant be released on furnishing P.R and S.B of Rs.15,000/­, on following conditions:­ a) He shall not tamper prosecution witnesses. b) He shall not leave India sans the permission of this Court. 2) Issue show cause notice to respondents as to why said order should not be confirmed. Notice r/o: 18.01.2019. 
---order-ends---
Pune. (Vikas S. Kulkarni) January 09, 2019 Additional Sessions Judge, Pune. I affirm that the contents of this P.D.F.,file judgment are same word for word as per original Judgment. Name of Steno :­ Smt. Mohini P. Rahurkar, Stenographer Gr.I Court Name :­ Shri. Vikas S. Kulkarni, Additional Sessions Judge,Pune Date :­ January 09, 2019 Judgment signed by P.O.
